title: A missile strike in Ukraine and floods in India: photos of the day – Tuesday
description: The Guardian’s picture editors select photographs from around the world Continue reading...
author: Guy Lane
excerpt: The Guardian’s picture editors select photographs from around the world
text: Lagos, Nigeria Men sit next to a poster of Fela Kuti, a Nigerian musician and political activist who is regarded as the principal innovator of Afrobeat, at the entrance of the New Afrika Shrine during Felabration week in the district of Ikeja. Every year, Lagos celebrates the musical legacy of Fela Kuti with a week of concerts at the legendary New Afrika Shrine in the working-class district of Ikeja
html:
Lagos, Nigeria

Men sit next to a poster of Fela Kuti, a Nigerian musician and political activist who is regarded as the principal innovator of Afrobeat, at the entrance of the New Afrika Shrine during Felabration week in the district of Ikeja. Every year, Lagos celebrates the musical legacy of Fela Kuti with a week of concerts at the legendary New Afrika Shrine in the working-class district of Ikeja
